Commentary: Shoaib Malik to Gayle, no run, tossed up outside off, driven straight to extra cover
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, 1 run, leg stumpish length ball, tucks through leg side
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, on a length, touch wide, left alone
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, pushes full on off stump, blocks it
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, tossed up around the off stump, hits him straight on the back leg, may be just the impact outside off, huge appeal...
Shoaib Malik to Delport, FOUR, short of a length ball and kept straightening after pitching outside off, punches through cover point
Sohail Khan to Gayle, no run, on a good length and moves across after pitching on off stump, left alone
Sohail Khan to Gayle, FOUR, once again gets the away movement with the angle, touch wide form a shortish length. Gayle throws his bat which catches the outside edge and flies over the slip cordon..
Sohail Khan to Gayle, no run, good length ball on leg stump, met with a straight face..
Sohail Khan to Gayle, no run, length ball around off, thrust uppishly and quite fiercely down to mid-on
Sohail Khan to Gayle, no run, short ball on middle stump, beaten..pacy stuff, cramps him
Sohail Khan to Gayle, FOUR, length ball moving across from the leftie, clears the front leg and swung it nicely up and over the midwicket, generates enough power onto it and clears the fence..
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, clips the pad down leg as he tries to flick this length ball..
Shoaib Malik to Delport, 1 run, flat length ball on middle, nudges it towards midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, no run, pushes it from the crease towards the off side
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, no run, driven straight back to the bowler, touch short..
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, 1 run, straying on the pads, clips it around the corner for a single
Shoaib Malik to Delport, 1 run, punches this short ball to wide of mid-off
Sohail Khan to Delport, no run, back of a length around off, punches to extra cover
Sohail Khan to Delport, FOUR, comes down the track and took it on the full, driven to the left of mid-off and races away to the fence..
Sohail Khan to Delport, 1 run, slower full ball around the leg stump, clips it away to the leg side
Sohail Khan to Gayle, 1 run, waits for this length ball, works it through midwicket
Sohail Khan to Delport, no run, pushes from the crease towards the off side
Sohail Khan to Delport, 1 run, works this length ball towards on side..
Shoaib Malik to Delport, 1 run, works this length ball through square leg
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, 1 run
Shoaib Malik to Delport, FOUR
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run
Shoaib Malik to Delport, 1 run, onto the toes, pushes to wide of mid-on
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, SIX, tossed up delivery around the off stump, skips down the track and belts it flat to wide of long-on region..
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, no run, pushes full and wide across, tries to squeeze it out, but beaten..
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, no run, once again can't put bat outside off
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, FOUR, drags this short and way down leg, helps that way to long leg fence with the man inside the circle..
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, 1 run, pierce the gap between mid-off and extra cover for a single, driven on the rise..
Sohail Tanvir to Gayle, no run, runs it with an open face to short third man, covers the stump to this length ball..
Sohail Tanvir to Gayle, no run, jabs it down to off side
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, yorker length on leg, blocks it out..
Shoaib Malik to Delport, 1 run, drifting on the legs, tucks it to the right of square leg..
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, 1 run, pushes full on the leg stump, again works it through gap on the leg side..
Shoaib Malik to Delport, 1 run, short of a length outside off, punches down to sweeper
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, 1 run, skids on from a length, pushes square of the wicket on off side
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, greets this length with a dead bat..
Sohail Tanvir to Gayle, FOUR, pushes full and wide across the leftie, clears the front leg and drags to wide of deep midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Gayle, 1 run, sits up on the back foot, cuts this short ball over cover point
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, FOUR, back of a length and comes in with the angle, picks up and slaps it down through wide of deep square leg
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, 1 run, length ball, nudges down to long-on
Sohail Tanvir to Gayle, 1 run, swung this touch shortish ball, one bounce to the man at deep midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, FOUR, pushes touch up and fullish well outside off, free his arms and clears the front leg and punishes straight down the ground with a side on bat..
Usama Mir to Delport, 1 run, comes out and thrust it along the ground to long-off
Usama Mir to Gayle, 1 run, slashes this widish short ball through backward point
Usama Mir to Delport, 1 run, full ball on off, drills to long-off
Usama Mir to Gayle, 1 run, swung this touch short ball down to deep backward square leg
Usama Mir to Delport, no run, wears it on the pad, as he tries to clip it through leg side
Usama Mir to Delport, FOUR, waits and runs that quite late to wide of third man for a boundary
Mir Hamza to Gayle, 1 run, full toss on off stump, pushes down to long-off
Mir Hamza to Delport, 1 run, another full toss, clips it through backward of square leg
Mir Hamza to Gayle, 1 run, waits on the back foot, checks his shot and grounded it to long-off
Mir Hamza to Delport, SIX, another full toss, clears the front leg and sends it straight down towards the sight screen, full flow of the bat..
Mir Hamza to Delport, 1 run, drags this short ball down to deepish midwicket for a single..
Mir Hamza to Gayle, SIX, that's some sheer power generated onto it, kept low from a good length. He gets down and reaches for it and send that flat into the wide of deep midwicket fence..
Usama Mir to Delport, SIX, that's how you get to your fifty. Down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball and tonks it back over the bowlers head.
Usama Mir to Delport, no run, quicker ball on middle and thuds on his pad
Usama Mir to Delport, no run, quick and flat on off, play and a miss
Usama Mir to Delport, 1 run, on his legs and nudged to on side for a single
Usama Mir to Gayle, 1 run, full on leg stump again, tickles to short fine leg for a run
Usama Mir to Delport, OUT, down the track, goes for an almighty heave, misses and an easy stumping for Mushi.
Wicket: ['CS Delport st †Mushfiqur Rahim b Usama Mir 55 (39b 7x4 2x6) SR: 141.02']

Commentary: Bopara to Gayle, OUT, Bopara gets his man. Mushi snaffles a skier. it was a length ball on off stump, slower one though and he goes for an almighty heave and the top edge finds Mushi's glove.
Bopara to Umar Akmal, no run, full on off stump, gets on the front foot and dabs to point
Wicket: ['CH Gayle c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Bopara 37 (28b 3x4 2x6) SR: 132.14']

Commentary: Bopara to Umar Akmal, 1 run, tails in from middle and tucks to backward square leg

Bopara to Bravo, OUT, Lahore! What are you doing? Saw him coming and bowls it short and wide on off stump. Bravo on the move, reaches out for the ball and he loses his footing. And the false shot flies to deep cover and Mir Hamza takes a fine low catch. What a waste of wicket.
Bopara to Umar Akmal, no run, length ball on the leg stump, tucks to short midwicket
Bopara to Umar Akmal, 1 run, short of a length and outside off, waits and runs it to third man with an open face
Wicket: ['DJ Bravo c Mir Hamza b Bopara 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, 1 run, fuller on off and nudged to on side for a single
Usama Mir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, yorker length on off and squirts it out to vacant on side
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, no run, flatter trajectory on off stump, goes for the cut and gets beaten
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, no run, length ball on off stump and pushed back to the bowler
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, 1 run, slower through the air on off, prods forward and pushes down the ground
Usama Mir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, looped on off stump, fends to cover with soft hands and pinch a quick run
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, flatter trajectory on off and cuts to point
Bopara to Umar Akmal, 1 run, fuller on middle and leg, nudged to long-leg
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, slower ball and no pace whatsoever, dabs to short third man
Bopara to Umar Akmal, 1 run, tad full on off stump, bunts down the ground for a run
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, yorker, full-straight on middle and off, digs it out
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, 2 runs, fraction short on off, swivels and pulls to long-leg and finds the sweeper napping, scampers for the second
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, 1 run, rubbish length on off stump, way too short and Akmal pull to deep mid wicket. Mir Hamza leaps up and palms it back. Lovely.
Usama Mir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, quicker ball on middle and off and nudged to on side
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, 1 run, leading edge falls in no mans land
Usama Mir to Mohammad Rizwan, 2 runs, tossed up and fetched it from outside off. Fielder runs in from square leg and goes well
Usama Mir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, tossed up, lot of air and paddled to on side
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, FOUR, poor! Very poor. Badly lined ball, full, tailing down the leg and he gives it a whack past diving short fine leg
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, full and straight, in the block-hole and he jabs it out. Toe crusher.
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, 2 runs, rolls his finger across and the length ball keeps a shade low too, pulls to mid-wicket. Two more
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, OUT, Ravi is delivering with the ball too. Fuller on middle and off. Rizwan shimmies across and looks to play a ramp shot, misses and it crashes into the middle pole.

Bopara to Hammad Azam, OUT, plumb? Or did that kiss the toe end of the bat first? Full and straight, swings away and Hammad looks to play across the line and thuds on his front pad. Boom. Aleem sends him back. Hammad looks at his bat. It did brushed the bat first.
Bopara to Naved Yasin, no run, hat trick ball has been negotiated, blocked

Bopara to Naved Yasin, OUT, five-fer! Length ball on off stump, slower ball and slapped straight to the sweeper at cover. Malik pouches it with ease. Cool as a cucumber. This game is swiftly slipping towards Karachi
Sohail Khan to Umar Akmal, 1 run, back of a length ball on off and mistimes to on side
Sohail Khan to Cooper, 1 run, fuller on middle and leg, nudged to on side for a single
Sohail Khan to Umar Akmal, 1 run, slower ball on off stump, much wider too and slapped to deep cover
Sohail Khan to Cooper, 1 run, keeps it full on off and drills down the ground for a single
Wicket: ['Naved Yasin c Shoaib Malik b Bopara 0 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Umar Akmal, no run, yorker, darted back in and hits him in front. LBW appeal denied.
Sohail Khan to Umar Akmal, 1 run, fuller on leg stump and tucked to deep on the leg side for a single
Bopara to Umar Akmal, FOUR, smartly played. Waits for the slower ball offered on off stump and sliced past gully

Bopara to Umar Akmal, OUT, there he goes and holes out at long-on. Fuller and slower on off stump, Akmal gets on the front foot and lofts to Shakib who gleefully accepts. The last beacon of hope has perished, I reckon
Bopara to Cooper, 1 run, full on leg stump and tucked to on side
Bopara to Zafar Gohar, 1 run, much fuller on off stump and drills down the ground for a single
Bopara to Cooper, no run, slower ball on off stump and fends back to the bowler
Bopara to Cooper, no run, yorker, misses and Ravi ends with 6 for 16.
Sohail Khan to Zafar Gohar, no run, full and tailing in, misses the leg pole by a whisker
Sohail Khan to Zafar Gohar, OUT, clean! Full-straight, typical tail enders swing across the line, misses it and cannons onto the stumps.

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Zohaib Khan, 1 run, fuller on off and nudged to long-on for a single
Sohail Khan to Cooper, FOUR, low full toss on leg stump and tucked to long-leg, no one out there and four more.
Sohail Khan to Cooper, 1 run, slower ball on off stump, goes for the heave but gets an thick inside edge onto the pad
Sohail Khan to Zohaib Khan, 1 run, width offered on off and slashed hard, mere single though
Sohail Tanvir to Zohaib Khan, 2 runs, low full toss on off and miscued his pull to on side, falls in no mans land and they scampered for the second
Sohail Tanvir to Zohaib Khan, 1 run, fuller on off stump and mowed to deep for a single
Sohail Tanvir to Cooper, 1 run, punched to mid-off for a single
Sohail Tanvir to Zohaib Khan, 1 run, fuller on off, bottom edge misses the stumps by a whisker
Sohail Tanvir to Cooper, 1 run, fuller on off and drilled to mid-off for a single
Sohail Tanvir to Zohaib Khan, FOUR, full on down the leg and whipped to long-leg. Four runs and its all over.
